channel.title: Making Client Backgrounds!
channel.description:
Well, I'm really bored right now and I have nothing better to do, So...
I'm making [b]FREE[/b] client backgrounds.
Just fill out the form below:
[code] Server Name*: Owner Name*: Other Text: Background Picture: [/code] * = REQUIRED
Only fill out 'Other Text' if you want to display different text. Only fill out 'Background Picture' if you have one that you want me to use, otherwise I'll make one myself.
